channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Latvia 2019
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Latvia 2019 by Economics Department has an embargo on Wednesday 29 May 2019 at 9:00 and a launch event planned on Wednesday 29 May 2019 at 9:00.

item.title: Unpacking E-commerce - Business Models, Trends and Policies
item.description: Unpacking E-commerce - Business Models, Trends and Policies by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Thursday 6 June 2019 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry

item.title: Artificial Intelligence in Society
item.description: Artificial Intelligence in Society by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Tuesday 11 June 2019 at 6:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry

item.title: OECD Investment Policy Reviews: Croatia 2019
item.description: OECD Investment Policy Reviews: Croatia 2019 by Directorate for Financial and Enterprise Affairs has an embargo on Monday 17 June 2019 at 9:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Financial and Enterprise Affairs
